ValidationRule.description: This is to assures that the sales person input the 1st year and total license amount correctly.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", RecordType.DeveloperName = "iMC Opportunity" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "iMC Renewal Opportunity", First_Year_License_Amount__c > Total_License_Amount__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Total License Amount must be equal or more than the 1st Year License Amount.
